name: BlenderMess
description:
Use your power cable to hook the *Twirling* fruits and *mischievously* make a mess! The *Upbeat* Music will surely compliment your *Happy* blender and make this experience unforgettable.

Click to shoot your power cable.  Blenderizing bad fruit will jam the blender a bit and make your cord shorter. Make the place as messy as you can!
